discourse_list.title: Canto: scaling through dynamic subnets (! ephemeral economies ! \xf0\x9f\x98\x81)

content.content: Medium – 8 Jan 19    CANTO :: Overview Scaling Ethereum through ephemeral economies Reading time: 6 min read       Hello everyone, at the suggestion of some folks I am posting the writeup I did on Canto. Give it a read if you haven’t seen it yet and share your thoughts - curious to hear peoples’ thoughts, criticisms. also pinging @zscole / @willmeister / @zscole / @araskachoi Where’s my shill @mariapaulafn at?
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is sharing a write-up on Canto, a proposal for scaling Ethereum through ephemeral economies, and is asking for feedback and criticisms from the readers. The post also mentions specific people to get their opinions and asks for the shill of another person.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: But we already had the @pedrouid comment thread argument on Twitter about whether it’s an L1 or L2 solution
